title: go.tools/go/importer: import failure of cyclic interface definitions
body:
To reproduce the problem, apply this patch and run the go/importer test suite:

diff -r eb49a6e58ac3 go/importer/import_test.go
--- a/go/importer/import_test.go        Tue Jun 03 14:16:59 2014 +1000
+++ b/go/importer/import_test.go        Tue Jun 10 11:57:50 2014 -0700
@@ -61,6 +61,7 @@
        `package p; type T chan int`,
        `package p; type T <-chan complex64`,
        `package p; type T chan<- map[int]string`,
+       `package p; type T1 interface { F(T2) }; type T2 interface { T1 }`,
 
        // vars
        `package p; var X int`,

$ go test
--- FAIL: TestImportSrc (0.01 seconds)
panic: interface conversion: interface is nil, not *types.Interface [recovered]
	panic: interface conversion: interface is nil, not *types.Interface

goroutine 20 [running]:
runtime.panic(0x2356c0, 0x2084692c0)
	/Users/gri/go/src/pkg/runtime/panic.c:279 +0xf5
testing.funcÂ·006()
	/Users/gri/go/src/pkg/testing/testing.go:416 +0x176
runtime.panic(0x2356c0, 0x2084692c0)
	/Users/gri/go/src/pkg/runtime/panic.c:248 +0x18d
code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/types.NewInterface(0x3cc5f8, 0x0, 0x0, 0x208466118, 0x1,
0x1, 0x20)
	/Users/gri/golib/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/types/type.go:272 +0x57f
code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/importer.(*importer).typ(0x208430660, 0x0, 0x0)
	/Users/gri/golib/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/importer/import.go:276 +0x1582
code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/importer.(*importer).typ(0x208430660, 0x0, 0x0)
	/Users/gri/golib/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/importer/import.go:314 +0x618
code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/importer.(*importer).param(0x208430660, 0x1)
	/Users/gri/golib/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/importer/import.go:380 +0x49
code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/importer.(*importer).tuple(0x208430660, 0x2084ae370)
	/Users/gri/golib/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/importer/import.go:386 +0x8b
code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/importer.(*importer).signature(0x208430660, 0x2084b8570)
	/Users/gri/golib/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/importer/import.go:376 +0x65
code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/importer.(*importer).typ(0x208430660, 0x0, 0x0)
	/Users/gri/golib/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/importer/import.go:256 +0x17e7
code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/importer.(*importer).typ(0x208430660, 0x0, 0x0)
	/Users/gri/golib/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/importer/import.go:273 +0x13d5
code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/importer.(*importer).typ(0x208430660, 0x0, 0x0)
	/Users/gri/golib/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/importer/import.go:314 +0x618
code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/importer.(*importer).obj(0x208430660, 0x2084ae2d0)
	/Users/gri/golib/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/importer/import.go:126 +0x5f7
code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/importer.ImportData(0x2084b84e0, 0x208478190, 0x33, 0x70,
0x2084aa1a0, 0x0, 0x0)

code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/importer.testExportImport(0x2084761b0, 0x2084ae0f0,
0x270cf0, 0x0, 0x43, 0x0)
	/Users/gri/golib/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/importer/import_test.go:148 +0xbb
code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/importer.TestImportSrc(0x2084761b0)
	/Users/gri/golib/src/code.google.com/p/go.tools/go/importer/import_test.go:93 +0x1db
testing.tRunner(0x2084761b0, 0x3c2e80)
	/Users/gri/go/src/pkg/testing/testing.go:422 +0x8b
created by testing.RunTests
	/Users/gri/go/src/pkg/testing/testing.go:504 +0x8db

Problem: NewInterface attempts to compute the method set before all involved interfaces
have been imported.
